formulas.description: assign campaign partner based on fire selected
formulas.name: fx_AssignCampaign

formulas.description: creates a name for the damage claim object
formulas.name: fx_Damage_Claim_Name
fx_DQ_Details_CQC
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by})) && (({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> "Eaton (Also known as Altadena)") && ({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> {!SF_Fire_Palisades})), "Don't accept fires in these locations at this time", IF({!QU_SF_Homeowner_Commercial} = "Other", "We only cover Homes and commercial properties currently.", IF({!QU_SF_Physical_Property_damage_check} = "None of the Above", "We only cover physical and emotional damage", IF({!SF_Location_Varification} = "Outside of Zone", "They are currently outside of the affected area borders", "" ))))

formulas.name: fx_DQ_Reason_CQC
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by})) && (({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> "Eaton (Also known as Altadena)") && ({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> {!SF_Fire_Palisades})), "Wrong location", IF({!QU_SF_Homeowner_Commercial} = "Other", "Insufficient coverage", IF({!QU_SF_Physical_Property_damage_check} = "None of the Above", "Insufficient damages", IF({!SF_Location_Varification} = "Outside of Zone", "Wrong location", "" ))))

formulas.description: determine what birthday is filled into the injured party field or not.
formulas.name: fx_InjuredPartyBirthDateField

formulas.description: Used to determine if it is a non-standard doc for signing or not.
formulas.name: fx_Non_Standard_Doc_Check

formulas.description: Formula for conditional visability based on responses.
formulas.name: fx_SF_Fire_CQC

formulas.description: determines if a CQC should be triggered on shortform or not and route agent to a DQ screen.
formulas.name: fx_ShortForm_CQC_Check
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by})) && (({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> "Eaton (Also known as Altadena)") && ({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> {!SF_Fire_Palisades})), "Fail", IF({!QU_SF_Homeowner_Commercial} = "Other", "Fail", IF({!QU_SF_Physical_Property_damage_check} = "None of the Above", "Fail", IF({!SF_Location_Varification} = "Outside of Zone", "Fail", "Pass" ))))

formulas.description: grabs today date for updating fields
formulas.name: fx_TODAY_Date

fields.name: alt_id_Ending_Display_Script_Guide
fields.fieldText:
Alternate ID Uploads

Question: Do you have any proof of residency in the burn area that youâ€™d be willing to provide upfront? Acceptable documents include a utility bill, valid driverâ€™s license, etc.

âœ… Important Note: Providing an alternate ID is NOT required. If the client is able and willing to share a proof of residency document, follow the steps below to upload it. Otherwise, proceed with the screen flow.


Alternate ID Upload Instructions

  1. Request Upload Link:
  • Click the "Request Proof of ID" button in the top right of the client file.
  • Follow the on-screen prompts to send the upload link via SMS or Email.
  1. Locate the Uploaded Document:
  • Once the client uploads their document, access it here:
    • ðŸ”— Proof of Residency Folder
  1. Save & Upload the Document:
  • Download the clientâ€™s specific document to your computer.
  • Open the clientâ€™s file and go to the "Documents" tab.
  • Drag and drop the downloaded document into this tab. It should upload automatically.
  1. Finalize the Upload:
  • Add a description: â€œProof of Client Residencyâ€
  • Verify the document appears in the clientâ€™s file.

Delete the file from your computer once you confirm the upload.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Add_Resident_Display_PS_Script
fields.fieldText:
-- Collect Extra Resident Information --


"We want to make sure the Law Firm is able to take care of everyone affected by the fire from your household."

"We need to quickly collect some information on each person and we will continue the final questions that will help the law firm process your case."

screens.name: Post_Signature_High_Priority_Routing_Screen
screens.label: Post Signature High Priority Routing Screen

fields.name: Copy_1_of_High_Priority_Display_PS_Script
fields.fieldText:
-- High Priority Warm Transfer Script --

Warm Transfers to Partner Firm:

â€œI have received your signed retainer agreement, and everything looks great! Iâ€™ll now transfer you to our partner firm who will go through some more questions with you and discuss the next steps of your potential case. Do you have any questions before I transfer you to the firm? 

Please stay on the line for a few minutes while I get you transferred. Thanks!


When we connect with an A&T representative, please provide them with:

  • Caller name
  • Client name
  • Injury (death case via physical injury or commercial property loss)

screens.description: Used to navigate decisions post signature and provide any scripting as needed
screens.name: Post_Signature_Review
screens.label: Post Signature Review

fields.name: Post_Signature_Display_Text_Living
fields.fieldText:
-- Signature Has Been Sent --

Make sure it has been signed before continuing

-- Signing Document Guidance Script --

â€œGreat! Now that we have gone through our first set of questions, Iâ€™ll walk you through our retainer agreement to ensure everything is clear before signing the document. Once weâ€™ve completed the signature portion, weâ€™ll move on to the next set of questions to continue the intake process.â€


ï»¿Explaining the Retainer Agreement:

The very first page of the paperwork is our retainer agreement. It basically states that we'll evaluate your case for free, and if we are not successful in recovering funds for you, you won't have to pay for our time or expenses. You will owe us nothing.


But if we do win, you'll get 70% of the settlement and the other 30% will go to our firm for our legal services. I also wanted to give you a rundown on some of the potential other costs you might encounter when pursuing any type of case, like court and filing costs, postage, photocopy, as well as retrieving medical records. In the event of a successful resolution, you agree to pay our firms a contingency fee equal to 30% of the value of your recovery, before all client expenses; which will have been advanced by us. Again though, we pay these fees on your behalf and only recover them if we achieve a successful outcome for you, so weâ€™re taking all the risk and will work our hardest to get a good result for you. Do you have any questions about the agreement? 

Then, you will see a HIPAA release form, this is just a medical release form we will send to your hospital to get information regarding this claim specifically and verify the information we just went over today.

To enhance your understanding of the paperwork, I'll connect you to a brief 2-minute recording from our Managing Attorney, Shannon Overcash. I will come back on the line when the recording is over.

fields.name: Post_Signature_Display_Text_Death
fields.fieldText:
-- Signature Has Been Sent --

Make sure it has been signed before continuing

-- Signing Document Guidance Script --

â€œGreat! Now that we have gone through our first set of questions, Iâ€™ll walk you through our retainer agreement to ensure everything is clear before signing the document. Once weâ€™ve completed the signature portion, weâ€™ll move on to the next set of questions to continue the intake process.â€


ï»¿Explaining the Retainer Agreement:

The very first page of the paperwork is our retainer agreement. It basically states that we'll evaluate your case for free, and if we are not successful in recovering funds for you, you won't have to pay for our time or expenses. You will owe us nothing.


But if we do win, you'll get 75% of the settlement and the other 25% will go to our firm for our legal services. I also wanted to give you a rundown on some of the potential other costs you might encounter when pursuing any type of case, like court and filing costs, postage, photocopy, as well as retrieving medical records. In the event of a successful resolution, you agree to pay our firms a contingency fee equal to 25% of the value of your recovery, before all client expenses; which will have been advanced by us. Again though, we pay these fees on your behalf and only recover them if we achieve a successful outcome for you, so weâ€™re taking all the risk and will work our hardest to get a good result for you. Do you have any questions about the agreement? 

Then, you will see a HIPAA release form, this is just a medical release form we will send to your hospital to get information regarding this claim specifically and verify the information we just went over today.

To enhance your understanding of the paperwork, I'll connect you to a brief 2-minute recording from our Managing Attorney, Shannon Overcash. I will come back on the line when the recording is over.

fields.name: SF_Disqualify_Screen
fields.fieldText:
UNFORTUNATELY THEY ARE DQ

Please Read: â€œUnfortunately, we cannot accept your potential case at this time. As such, we are not able to represent you and will not be filing a lawsuit on your behalf. This does not mean you donâ€™t have a case. Please consider contacting another law firm for a second opinion. Thank you for taking the time to speak with us at Saddle Rock Legal Group. Have a great day!â€


**Note to Agent: If the caller asked 'why', itâ€™s okay to simply state that 'Thereâ€™s a current lack of evidence to fit our case criteria.' No further details than that.

fields.name: Residents_Script
fields.fieldText:
Please Read: If youâ€™re looking to start a potential case for a loved one, neighbor, or anyone else affected by the fires, we will need to speak directly with the person impacted. If theyâ€™re available, youâ€™re welcome to have them join the call now so we can go over the necessary details together.

If theyâ€™re not available at the moment, you can pass along our contact information so they can reach out to us directly. They can call us at 833-430-8111, and our team will go over a few questions with them. If everything aligns from a preliminary standpoint, we will then send them a retainer agreement for review.

How would you like to proceed?

fields.name: Signature_Page_Display_Script
fields.fieldText:
-- Sending Signature Script --


*** Short form complete- Please play the attorney recording now***


Once Attorney Recording is Finished

Thank you for staying on the line for this recording. If you have any questions, please let me know. Go ahead and place me on speakerphone, if not already, and check your phone. I just sent you a link to the paperwork, which should have come as a text message to your email. This message should ask you to view, sign, and then include a link. When you see this message, click on the link, which should load the paperwork for you.â€

[Open documents with client]

fields.name: Disqualifying_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: Disqualified

fields.name: Disqualifying_Text_Display
fields.fieldText: Your Intake has been turned down and properly updated.

fields.name: Display_Text_Title_Link
fields.fieldText:
Homeowner Lookup Script

  1. If the caller matches the information:
  2. â€œThank you for your patience. It looks like you are the current homeowner of this property, and we will continue through the process.â€
  3. If the caller doesnâ€™t match the information:
  4. â€œThank you for your patience. It appears the information we have here shows a different name as the homeowner for this property. Thatâ€™s no problem at all! We can still assist you.â€ What I would recommend is that you share our contact information with the homeowner so they can reach out directly and we be glad to assist them in this process.

fields.name: QU_House_Value_TotalPropertyWorth
fields.fieldText: Total Property Worth (from house value site)

textTemplates.description: Used as the email template for high Priority Emails
textTemplates.name: High_Priority_Email
textTemplates.text:
Hi Everyone,


We have a high-value case coming your way shortly. Please be ready for a live transfer in the next few minutes.


Client information:

Caller Name: {!Get_Client_Record.Name}

Client Name: {!Get_Client_Record.Name}


CQC Outputs:

-- Coming Soon --

textTemplates.description: Used to fill in the questionnaire response document that creates a word doc to send via email to our partners.
textTemplates.name: QuestionnaireResponseDocumentOutput

textTemplates.description: Very end of the questionnaire script for agent to read off.
textTemplates.name: Scripting_Closing_Ending_Script
textTemplates.text:
Read General Wrap Up Script:

  • Before we wrap up, we want to emphasize the importance of your role in this process. This is YOUR case and we can only help you if youâ€™re responsive to our requests when we or our partner firm {!Get_Initiating_Intake.Referral_Partner_Name__c}, reach out.    
  • Thereâ€™s no greater compliment than receiving referrals to represent your friends or family as well in this case. Do you know anyone who may need legal assistance regarding this same matter? If so, please have them call us at 888-686-6454.
  • Looking ahead, our quality team will be reviewing your file and referring it over to our partnering firm, {!Get_Initiating_Intake.Referral_Partner_Name__c}. A member of their staff should reach out to you within 4-5 weeks to discuss next steps. You can also reach us at Saddle Rock Legal at 888-686-6454. Since we're collaborating on this case, a call from either one of us is expected. Please remember youâ€™ve signed a legal contract between you, Saddle Rock Legal and {!Get_Initiating_Intake.Referral_Partner_Name__c}, as such, you do not need to seek any additional legal counsel regarding your {!Get_Initiating_Intake.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name} case. We are your attorneys for this matter.  
  • Before a member of our partner firm reaches out to you for a more in-depth discussion about your case, we kindly request that you collect and keep any medical records related to your illness. When contacted, you will be requested to provide any relevant records you have in your possession to support your case. 
  •  If you have any additional questions, please let us know. If not, thank you for allowing Saddle Rock Legal Group and {!Get_Initiating_Intake.Referral_Partner_Name__c} to represent you in your {!Get_Initiating_Intake.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name}. Have a great day!

variables.description: Extra residents that were also affected in this ordeal to be generated and information collected on them via flow.
variables.name: var_col_Extra_Residents
